name: Traffic Jam (Fruzum)
description:
Within this top down isometric strategy game
Use the traffic lights to controls the flow of cars on the street to mitigate traffic
Make sure the traffic doesn't build up
Be careful not to cause any accidents

Made by Team Confirmed at Media Design School 
Prototype 1 - Year 3

Programmers:
James Monk
Sally Gillbanks

Artists:
Max Bainbridge
Zane Bronnimann
Ryan Coates
Janelle Ducker
